title: What are the things that make you happy in your life? - Quora

response.answer_text: Happiness is in small things. Anything touched you deep inside, can make you happy. Happiness is hiding in everything. It's up to you how you can see it and feel it. It's about to experience. It can be from the star in sky or stone on earth. Happiness can come from any of these things: Kids are source of happiness. Sleeping of a child in your arms makes us feel happy. When a child hold your finger to walk, you feel the utter happiness.Animals are not behind in making a human happy. When you enter your home after work, a dog/cat/pet sitting in door and waiting for you makes you feel happy and important. Their love, playing with you makes you feel good.Talk with anyone about childhood things makes us to feel it and makes so happy. When talk about fight in Street cricket, run from school to play, all childhood things when remember makes us happy.Friends also makes us happy. But friends only attached to your heart can do it.Appreciation from any person for your clothes, looking, behaviours makes you happy.Traveling to any place, hill station, sea also fill the happiest waves inside youFood (awwwww my tounge) makes you happy for sure. To eat buffet at any restaurant when feel hungry will make you happy for sure.Success in any sector, study, work, business is the boost inside us. It gives peace, satisfaction and happiness all.Mother care makes you feel the loveliest happiness. When mother serve food for you, the moment you can feel everything.Help anybody makes you feel deepest smile inside your heart. It's the little things that can bring a smile...  an upvote from your favorite writer on Q.a double rainbowa movie that is so good you dont want it to end.blush pink.roses in full bloom.when someone hurts your feelings and says "I am sorry" right away.you unexpectedly get a day off from work with pay.someone smiles at you.for no reason.except they are in a good mood.a great clean joke.your favorite homemade dessert.receiving a surprise thankyou card.a text from your kids with a happy face and a heart.if you are a server and you receive a generous hard earned tip.a book you think about in a good way, long after you are done reading it.the smell.and taste of hot cocoa on a cold morning.fresh fallen snow.someone offers you their seat on a crowded bus.a big hug when you are feeling down.finding your old wallet with $20.00in it.hearing your favorite music in the background somewhere unexpected.the sound of joyful laughterseeing the people you love happy.the last thought you had just before falling asleep that made you happy to be you.remembering the first time you tried to go skiing.when your best friend rreminds you of a happy memory you made together.jumping rope with.kids.making your last car or mortgage payment.getting an unexpected raise or bonus.getting good news from your doctor.looking at your adult children's baby pictures.laughing at your own.thinking back on your life and feeling good knowing you have exceeded your expectations for yourself, wondering how was that possible.doing something nice for a complete stranger anonymously.being the recipient of such a kindness.hugging the youngest or oldest person in your family with love and gratitude.This was a great question...thank you.for making me smile! :)
